SEARCH
Package iscte.lige.k.service

Class PropertiesLoader

java.lang.Object
iscte.lige.k.service.PropertiesLoader
public class PropertiesLoader extends Object
Singleton class responsible for loading, parsing and managing all property-related data. Parses input CSV, builds neighbour relations, creates simplified property versions, generates trades, and provides filtered access based on administrative divisions.

    • getInstance

      public static PropertiesLoader getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of PropertiesLoader, initializing it on first access.
      Returns:
      the shared PropertiesLoader instance

    • setLoadingOptions

      public void setLoadingOptions(String[] options)
      Sets filtering criteria for subsequent data retrievals.
      Parameters:
      options - two-element array: [criteria, value]
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the criteria is not one of "proprietarios", "freguesia", "concelho", "ilha"

    • getLoadingOptions

      public String[] getLoadingOptions()
      Returns the current filtering criteria and value.
      Returns:
      two-element array: [criteria, value]

      Returns:

    • getAvgArea

      public int getAvgArea()
      Retrieves the average area by property for a set of properties, according to the current loading options.
      Returns:
